医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
盒中心脏技术提高了心脏移植的成功率如果将供体心脏储存在所谓的盒装心脏中，而不是通常的加冰的冷藏箱中，那么心脏移植后发生早期心力衰竭的风险就会降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Heart-in-a-box-technology-enhances-success-of-heart-transplants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Heart-in-a-box-technology-enhances-success-of-heart-transplants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7956f38-56ac-4e97-bfb6-7f2025762198 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 22:30:00 -0400 Heart-in-a-box technology enhances success of heart transplants
了解精神障碍中大脑网络和认知缺陷之间的联系根据新的研究，精神分裂症和双相情感障碍等精神障碍的认知障碍与大脑网络组织有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Understanding-the-connection- Between-brain-networks-and-cognitive-deficits-in-psychotic-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Understanding-the-connection- Between-brain-networks-and-cognitive-deficits-in-psychotic-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc3e3753-7182-400d-a6e3-0a4ea34fcaac Tue, 20 Aug 2024 21:51:43 -0400 Understanding the connection between brain networks and cognitive deficits in psychotic disorders
自我引导认知行为治疗应用程序可减少年轻人的焦虑威尔康奈尔医学院和纽约长老会医院的研究人员发现，一款名为 Maya 的自我引导认知行为治疗 (CBT) 应用程序可以显着减少面临心理健康挑战的年轻人的焦虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Self-guided-cognitive-behavioral-therapy-app-reduces-anxiety-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Self-guided-cognitive-behavioral-therapy-app-reduces-anxiety-in-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67e88a3f-7786-4949-9e0e-faf3fa395c68 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 21:43:43 -0400 Self-guided cognitive behavioral therapy app reduces anxiety in young adults
探索基因沉默机制以改进 RNAi 疗法RNA 干扰 (RNAi) 疗法因其治疗多种疾病（包括遗传性疾病、病毒感染和癌症）的潜力而在临床研究中引起了极大关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Exploring-gene-silencing-mechanisms-for-improved-RNAi-therapeutics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Exploring-gene-silencing-mechanisms-for-improved-RNAi-therapeutics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26f998fa-a062-426d-b462-bdc98a6048b6 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 21:24:19 -0400 Exploring gene silencing mechanisms for improved RNAi therapeutics
伦敦大学研究人员获得 360 万美元用于研究砷暴露在导致健康问题中的作用路易斯维尔大学的研究人员获得了 360 万美元的新拨款，用于研究砷暴露在导致癌症和其他重大健康问题中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/UofL-researchers-receive-2436-million-to-study-the-role-of-arsenic-exposure-in-causing-health-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/UofL-researchers-receive-2436-million-to-study-the-role-of-arsenic-exposure-in-causing-health-problems.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=866f918d-e03b-43e2-98b7-379f17f518b8 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 15:25:18 -0400 UofL researchers receive $3.6 million to study the role of arsenic exposure in causing health problems
AI可以有效排除胸部X光检查中的病理根据美国放射学会杂志《放射学》今天发表的一项研究，在标签外使用的商业人工智能 (AI) 工具可以有效排除病理，并且胸部 X 光检查的严重漏检率与放射科医生相同或更低。北美（RSNA）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/AI-can- effectively-exclude-pathology-in-chest-X-rays.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/AI-can- effectively-exclude-pathology-in-chest-X-rays.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab12e03b-7a06-453d-830d-4892546221fd Tue, 20 Aug 2024 15:20:58 -0400 AI can effectively exclude pathology in chest X-rays
简化的吸烟测试被证明可以可靠地预测癌症患者的戒烟情况来自近 6000 名患有癌症的吸烟者的数据表明，预测谁会戒烟可能比之前想象的更容易。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Simplified-smoking-test-proves-reliable-for-predicting-abstinence-in-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Simplified-smoking-test-proves-reliable-for-predicting-abstinence-in-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bafbf724-eff0-4c3a-b3a5-4a6692eb52a7 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 15:14:16 -0400 Simplified smoking test proves reliable for predicting abstinence in cancer patients
乙酰神经酸药物获批用于治疗 GNE 肌病患者为了治疗得不到充分治疗的罕见疾病患者群体，他们的肌肉逐渐变弱直至无法行走，日本各地的一组研究人员完成了一项临床研究，以确认长期服用治疗药物的安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Aceneuramic-acid-drug-receives-approval-for-treatment-of-病人-with-GNE-myopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Aceneuramic-acid-drug-receives-approval-for-treatment-of-病人-with-GNE-myopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3bec80b-48ef-4d81-b6eb-4b5b96824f91 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 15:09:43 -0400 Aceneuramic acid drug receives approval for treatment of patients with GNE myopathy
精准医学通过基因分析增强前列腺癌治疗患有转移性去势抵抗性前列腺癌的男性应主要使用第二代激素药物治疗，与化疗相比，这种药物具有更好的治疗反应和更长的预期寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Precision-medicine-enhances-prostate-cancer-treatment-with-genic-profiling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Precision-medicine-enhances-prostate-cancer-treatment-with-genic-profiling.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2735865-687d-4ec5-a190-7ee6d36e99a7 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 14:57:00 -0400 Precision medicine enhances prostate cancer treatment with genetic profiling
革命性的血小板评分为心脏病发作提供更好的风险评估血小板是循环细胞碎片，已知会聚集并形成血凝块，从而阻止受伤血管的出血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Revolutionary-platelet-score-offers-better-risk-assessment-for-heart-attacks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Revolutionary-platelet-score-offers-better-risk-assessment-for-heart-attacks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab0111bf-3f3f-4d34-b4d7-b98b93411672 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 14:29:19 -0400 Revolutionary platelet score offers better risk assessment for heart attacks
